author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

More Alpaka and ROCm-related updates:
  - move `HeterogeneousCore/AlpakaCore/interface/MakerMacros.h` under `alpaka/`
  - add `PortableTestObjects` data formats for the ROCm Alpaka backend
  - rename `alpaka_hip_async` to `alpaka_rocm_async`
  - add support for AMD GPUs via the `ProcessAcceleratorROCm`
  - adopt the "alternative module loading" approach in the Alpaka test
  - update the description of the "backend" parameter

#### PR validation:

All unit tests should pass.
title: More Alpaka and ROCm-related updates
